name: Zombie Fortress: Ice Age
description:
A Zombie Plague is sweeping across the Ice Age island, can you citizen help the human survivors against the walking dead. Can you survive yourself? Become the ultimate hunter, there’s a fortress made from an older settlement, find and pick up other survivors in your jeep while looking for supplies/ammo and return them to your fortress and protect them.

Frozen and scared, you must battle with the elements and hunt these dangerous carnivores:

Sabertooth Tiger, Mammoth, Dire Wolf, Short faced Bear, Wooly Rhino, Megaloceros, Diatryma, Doedicurus, Plesiosaur, Dunkleosteus, Teratorn and Yeti.

Use your 4x4 Off-Road Vehicle, Skidoo, Boat and Horse to encounter deadly animals.

Weapons include: Handgun/Rifle/Pistol Crossbow(Explosive Arrows)/Compound Bow/Proximity Mines/Gas Canisters.

Zombie Fortress Evolution: Ice age has High quality graphics and gameplay.

Build Camp fires, become the ultimate hunter and hunt by night in this world that never sleeps.

Survival can be fun and given you don’t have the choice, let the hunting begin!
